General.Name: Tiansheng Pharmaceutical Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Tiansheng Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd. engages in the pharmaceutical manufacturing and circulation activities. It offers products in various categories, including respiratory, digestive, cardiovascular and cerebrovascular, pediatric, gynecological, orthopedic, tumor, hepatobiliary, blood, surgery, diabetes, and others. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Chongqing, China.
